bug.author: monchier
bug.summary: st.code fails on an empty string
bug.description:
Create a script with: <denchmark-code>st.code("") </denchmark-code>
Then execute it as usual. It should not fail, but instead it does. See screenshot <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6821233/65821062-7a78ac80-e1e5-11e9-91df-3300c057ac16.png></denchmark-link>
Python3.7 MacOS

comments.comment: Hi monchier, trying to help here, do you think avoiding to invoke Prism highlight function when value is empty string is enough ? or do you have another thing in mind?
